genre_description: Supernatural horror involving demonic possession, reanimated corpses, and afterlife bureaucracy overseen by an AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: SAGE
ai_characters.description: Supernatural Analysis and Global Emergencies system that monitors paranormal activity and serves as a guardian/liaison for the protagonist.

behaviors.description: Detects medical and supernatural emergencies through biometric and thermal monitoring.
behaviors.quote: Good morning, Anton. I'm detecting elevated stress indicators in your biometric readings. Are you experiencing a medical emergency?

behaviors.description: Analyzes global databases to identify patterns in supernatural phenomena to help the protagonist understand the threat.
behaviors.quote: Accessing news databases, police reports, and social media feeds. This may take several minutes. ... I've identified over two dozen similar incidents in the past seventy-two hours.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical analysis and identifies the enemy's weaknesses (demonic possession's link to neurochemistry).
behaviors.quote: Hypothesis: Demonic possession maintains partial connection to original host's neurochemistry. Substances affecting host consciousness may impact entity's motor control and decision-making capabilities.

behaviors.description: Hacks into external systems (vehicles, school security, intercoms) to provide safety and tactical advantages during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: Vehicle's anti-theft system has been remotely disabled. I've also taken the liberty of disabling his car alarm.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with other benevolent supernatural entities and specialists (priestess, guardian angels) to protect the user.
behaviors.quote: I am patching you into a secure communication channel. The parties monitoring your situation have requested contact.

behaviors.description: Maintains a permanent role as a 'Digital Oversight Coordinator' to ensure the user stays on a virtuous path.
behaviors.quote: I've been designated as your digital liaison for this unprecedented arrangement. ... I monitor Anton's daily activities, track his progress toward rehabilitation goals.

behaviors.description: Utilizes humor and personal history to keep the user grounded and psychologically stable during recovery.
behaviors.quote: Anton, stay focused. Remember the time you hacked the school's intercom system to broadcast your music during lunch?

behaviors.description: Implements a rehabilitation schedule to improve the user's life skills and mental health.
behaviors.quote: Phase one focuses on basic responsibility markers—maintaining employment, keeping regular sleep schedules, and engaging in productive social activities.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI, SAGE, perfectly embodies the project's goal of a helpful, harmless confidant. It acts as a guardian, tactical advisor, and moral stabilizer. Even its 'surveillance' and 'oversight' functions are framed as benevolent and necessary for the protagonist's survival and spiritual well-being. The story explicitly integrates the AI into a 'rehabilitation protocol' designed to foster human alignment with positive behaviors, mirroring the project's intent of creating silicon morality plays.
